    • Constructor Detail

      • PackerBuildCommand

        public PackerBuildCommand(MessageDigestCreator digestCreator,
                          File inputDir,
                          boolean changesNeeded,
                          boolean invalidateOnFailure,
                          String templatePath,
                          boolean force,
                          Set<String> only,
                          Set<String> except,
                          Map<String,Object> vars,
                          Set<String> varFiles)
        Packer build command complete constructor.
        Parameters:
        digestCreator - Message digest used to obtain input files hash.
        inputDir - Directory where input files are located.
        changesNeeded - Whether changes on source files are needed for this command to don't be ignored.
        invalidateOnFailure - Whether files will be invalidated if command executions fails.
        templatePath - Input directory relative path of template used for this build.
        only - Set of builder names that must be taken into account. Empty for all.
        except - Set of builder names that must be ignored.
        force - Whether execution should overwrite Packer output directory.
        vars - Variables used for this build.
        varFiles - Variable files used for this build.

      • init

        public boolean init(PackerCommandLogger logger,
                    TimeoutHandler timeoutHandler)
             throws PackerCommandException,
                    TimeoutException
        Description copied from interface: PackerCommand
        Life cycle initialization step. It may prepare all that the command needs to be ran. Return flag determines if command will continue running or it must be skipped.
        Specified by:
        init in interface PackerCommand
        Parameters:
        logger - Logger passed by command task.
        timeoutHandler - Timeout handler aligned with command task.
        Returns:
        true if command must continue running, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        PackerCommandException - When initialization error has occurred.
        TimeoutException - When timeout has reached during initialization.
